titleStmt.title: Man's terrene-refuge sleighted: and the excellency of celestiall concernments briefly asserted, / by Ric. Warde Gent. and directed to his worthy friend in a letter.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Richard, 1601 or 2-1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.H. for Henry Seile,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with slight loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
